title: A semi-vapor electrolysis technology for hydrogen generation from wide water resources
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7394-7402
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02722A, Paper
Jiayi Tang, Ke Guo, Daqin Guan, Yong Hao, Zongping Shao
A semi-vapor electrolysis process is proposed to enable cost-effective co-production of hydrogen and pure water with cheaper electrode materials, eliminating the need for water purification and improving energy efficiency.
